title: SAP security advisory – March 2025 monthly rollup (AV25-126)
description: On March 11, 2025, SAP published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following:
products: SAP Commerce Cloud   versions HY-COM 2205 and COM-CLOUD 2211
SAP NetWeaver (ABAP Class Builder)   multiple versions
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
